title: AI Image Comparer
subtitle: Interactively compare images, or use AI to generate images from a text prompt.
uploadCTA: Click to upload or drag & drop
uploadAfterPrompt: Now upload an "After" image to compare
uploadBothPrompt: Upload both 'Before' and 'After' images to start comparing
promptDescriptionAI: Describe the image you want to create
promptPlaceholderAI: e.g., 'A majestic lion in a snowy forest, cinematic lighting', 'A futuristic city skyline at sunset, cyberpunk style'
errorGemini: Failed to generate image. The model may be unavailable or there was a network issue.
errorSafety: The prompt may have been blocked due to safety policies. Please try a different prompt.
errorNoImage: AI did not return an image. Please try a different prompt.
errorLoadAIImage: Failed to load the generated image from AI.
errorApiKeyMissing: API Key is required for this feature. Please provide your key when prompted.
errorInvalidApiKey: The provided API Key is not valid. Please try again.
aiImagePlaceholder: Your generated image will appear here.
